Usage: Daily Commute | Tours | Occasional Commute | Family Car
Review: Stunning look, seemless power flow make drive enjoyable. very advanced features like line assist and virtual cockpit, etc. enough space inside and decent ground clearance like any other compitive suv in the market.

It is an amazing car to drive with good safety features, excellent driving experience. Good leather seats,adequate ground clearance, mileage in city not bad but in highways 17.5km/l,, most comfortable for driving.
